title: Killer Instinct: Steam Edition
body:
Killer Instinct: Steam Edition


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, Side, 3D
Companies: Double Helix Games, Iron Galaxy Studios, Microsoft Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 33.3 GB
Repack Size: from 17.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: 3 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MU mirros) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Killer.Instinct-CODEX ISO release: codex-killer.instinct.iso (35,731,177,472 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of animated background videos, figter reels and fighter trailers
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 33.3 to 17.5~23.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 44 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Discover your Killer Instinct! The legendary fighting game franchise comes to Steam!

The legendary fighting franchise is back with over-the-top action, a wild cast of combatants, rocking reactive music, and C-C-C-COMBO BREAKERS!!! Choose your ultimate combatants each with fluid animations, unique combat tactics, and enthralling special attacks. Use the open-ended combo system to rack up huge combos as your opponent looks for openings to break you and turn the tides of battle. Go online and compete against players from all over the world, or master your combat skills with in-depth tutorials and intelligent AI combatants.

Game Features

  • Extensive cast of powerful combatants with tons of customization options including Retro Costumes and Accessories.
  • 20 Stages with dynamic stage environments.
  • Award winning audio
  • Competitive online matches.
  • Unique, well balanced characters to fit your fighting style.
  • Test your skill online in Ranked Leagues.
  • Cinematic Story Mode.
  • Extensive Dojo tutorial teaches all the core mechanics for Killer Instinct.
  • Train an AI combatant and challenge your friends to asynchronous matches in Shadow Lab.
